00081 
00082 /*
00083  * The library does not require to pass the current transaction as a
00084  * parameter to the functions (the current transaction is stored in a
00085  * thread-local variable).  One can, however, compile the library with
00086  * explicit transaction parameters.  This is useful, for instance, for
00087  * performance on architectures that do not support TLS or for easier
00088  * compiler integration.
00089  */
00090 # ifdef EXPLICIT_TX_PARAMETER
00091 struct stm_tx;
00092 #  define TXTYPE                        struct stm_tx *
00093 #  define TXPARAM                       struct stm_tx *tx
00094 #  define TXPARAMS                      struct stm_tx *tx,
00095 #  define TXARG                         (struct stm_tx *)tx
00096 #  define TXARGS                        (struct stm_tx *)tx,
00097 struct stm_tx *stm_current_tx();
00098 # else /* ! EXPLICIT_TX_PARAMETER */
00099 #  define TXTYPE                        void
00100 #  define TXPARAM                       /* Nothing */
00101 #  define TXPARAMS                      /* Nothing */
00102 #  define TXARG                         /* Nothing */
00103 #  define TXARGS                        /* Nothing */
00104 #endif /* ! EXPLICIT_TX_PARAMETER */
00105

00134   int ro;
